item.description:

Don't be lazy: most chart-making sites have automated readings

>Tips for Posting:
· Be respectful
· Have some questions ready when posting your chart
· Ignore posters who only post their chart w/o context
· Have fun

item.title: Does anyone remember the fog crepypasta?
item.dc:creator: Rukiman_no16
item.description:
Does anyone remember that creepypasta about a cloud that forms a fog that drives everyone crazy and they start eating each other? It was really bad, but no one seems to remember her.
People used to post it with a picture of a town covered in fog, but I couldn't find the picture. I would love someone to help me find it, even if it is the image that was used.

item.title: I dont work with anyone, never will
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
I dont work with anyone, never will.
Don't offer me things.
I don't owe you anything.
Your delusions about me being your next tyrant nemesis are a delusion and you should seek help for it.
None of your plans work with me.
I can talk about you if I please.
I wont curse your or insult you as I see no use for it.

I hope everything works out with your war, but I'm not in it. Thank you for your interest.
Have a nice week.

item.title: >just live in the "now" bro...
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
>just live in the "now" bro and enjoy the moment thats what ur here for

Tell me how this isn't just a massive Stockholm syndrome cope of a being forced to live in a fake constructed reality it never asked to be born in. I don't want to give in to the Stockholm syndrome. How do we rebel against our captors? What is it that the creators if this reality, DON'T want us to do?? Let's expand on this. Share your ideas.

item.title: You won't see paranormal or magic unless..
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
You reject this mundane garbage world and you are willing to 'jump off a cliff'. You know what I real eyes'd today when I went to godlikeproductions. Boomers on there are pompous and arrogant pieces of shit. There are a few that are genuine and seem real. But they are so programmed with that boomer programming. I'm a boomer and the decades before 2000 were good, better than now, but I am so repulsed by the programming and the pompous and arrogant attitude

I come on 4chan paranormal and it seems a lot of bullshit being flung around but once in awhile you get somebody who seems genuine and real but also who isn't buying into the programming. What is refreshing about this place is you are younger here and your programming isn't filling you with such certainty and pride as with the boomers on godlikeproductions. I certainly appreciate 1-3 people on 4chan paranormal when they post 'cause you can tell they don't have any baggage.

I think key to paranormal and magic, like I said, is to reject this mundane world and be willing to 'jump off a cliff'. I think also by not embracing any programming the 'matrix' for lack of better terminology, can't 'pin you down' in scripting. That's why you might get interesting shit. I'm not an expert by any means but there are lots of traps in this simulated world. We are so fuckin programmed with shit like religion etc. Those 'normies' don't see shit 'cause they watch TV or work and keep busy. If they're not doing that they're entertaining themselves. They never OBSERVE THINGS. The 'matrix' wants you busy so you don't notice things. That's the truth!

item.title: /ceg/ Christian Esotericism General #9
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
9 like the 9 Choirs of Angels
Christian Esotericism is the inner and/or mystical aspect of the Christian Religion, it includes:
>Christian Gnosis (Clement of Alexandria)
>Desert Fathers Spirituality (Evagrius Ponticus)
>Catholic Contemplative Tradition (Bonaventure)
>Hesychasm (Gregory Palamas)
>Chivalry (Wolfram von Eschenbach)
>Rhineland Mysticism (Meister Eckhart)
>Christian Cabala (Johannes Reuchlin)
>Rosicrucianism (Robert Fludd)
>Christian theosophy (Jakob Böhme)
>Martinism (Louise Claude de Saint-Martin)
>Swedenborgianism (Swedenborg)
>Anthroposophy (Rudolf Steiner)
>Sophiology (Sergei Bulgakov)
>Christian Hermeticism (Valentin Tomberg)
>Fourth Way (Boris Mouravieff)
>Christian Traditionalism (Jean Borella)
And much more, so let's continue to talk about it!

>Resources (WIP)
https://www.john-uebersax.com/plato/cp.htm
https://jacobboehmeonline.com/
https://archive.org/details/awakening-to-divine-wisdom-christian-initiation-into-three-worl-nodrm_202202/mode/1up
http://janelead.org/resources.html
https://archive.org/details/bookofcontemplat00unde/
https://swedenborg.com/bookstore/free-ebooks-downloads/
https://www.giffordlectures.org/books/theosophy-or-psychological-religion
https://www.gornahoor.net/?page_id=47
